item.title: Foldable for non-Haskellers: Haskell's controversial FTP proposal
item.description: In the Haskell world, there is currently a big fuss about the “Foldable/Traversable in Prelude”-proposal.

item.title: Hangman in Haskell
item.description: As I noticed a question for a more idiomatic Haskell version of the game Hangman on codereview.

item.title: Selling DDD
item.description: A little while ago, we gave a series of short talks called “DDD Basics” for the Belgian Domain-driven design community.
